definitions.definition: Done only or merely to conform to a minimal standard or to fulfill a protocol or presumptive duty.
Performed in a careless or indifferent manner as a thing of rote .
examples: He did a perfunctory job cleaning his dad's car, finishing quickly but leaving a few spots still dirty.

main_definition: Done only or merely to conform to a minimal standard or to fulfill a protocol or presumptive duty.
secondary_definitions: Performed in a careless or indifferent manner as a thing of rote .
